comments.raw_text:
Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:2.0b13pre) Gecko/20110315 Firefox/4.0b13pre

Switching between themes in Ubuntu will display wrong buttons in Firefox (see Screenshot 1).

Reproducible: always

Steps to reproduce:
1. Set Ubuntu to default theme - Ambiance
2. Enter Firefox and observe forward/back buttons
3. Change Ubuntu theme to Clearlooks
4. Enter Firefox and observe forward/back buttons

Actual results:
 - one of the buttons has the characteristics of one theme, the other of another

Expected results:
 - both have same characteristics.
